author: tersec
content: Yeah, I sort of don't have much issue with the specific method of doing this -- I agree with the basic idea that, probably, it needs a new version of the call. But this at least 3rd or fourth API change, desired CL behavior change, et cetera solely to protect relays' interests. It's sort of one of the reasons I sometimes don't comment on these too much, because while I'm skeptical, it's not really some question of what the best way to do it is, but whether it should be done at all, and it becomes a virtual fait accompli at some point.

author: tersec
content: I think it's at least worth having an intentional disposition on things which no one other than relays/builders have asked for
